  17. (* CSE for the RISC-V *)

  19. open Arch
  20. open Mach
  21. open CSEgen

  23. class cse = object (_self)

  25. inherit cse_generic as super

  27. method! class_of_operation op =
  28.   match op with
  29.   | Ispecific(Imultaddf _ | Imultsubf _) -> Op_pure
  30.   | _ -> super#class_of_operation op

  32. method! is_cheap_operation op =
  33.   match op with
  34.   | Iconst_int n -> n <= 0x7FFF_FFFFn && n >= -0x8000_0000n
  35.   | _ -> false

  37. end

  39. ‌let fundecl f =
  40.   (new cse)#fundecl f
